title: Reflective Process-Based Learning Design for Improving Design Education Methodology

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental design principles and mathematical modeling
context.additional_context: Design-Mathematics Convergence Education for Working Professionals, utilizing an asynchronous learning environment via smartphone-based LMS

learning_goals: Learners develop the ability to systematically analyze problems occurring in the design process using the IAES model (Investigate-Apply-Explain-Share)
Learners develop the ability to present logical justifications for design processes by applying mathematical modeling techniques
Learners improve reflective thinking in the design decision-making process by over 80% through peer feedback and self-assessment
Learners meet evaluation criteria by systematically documenting (portfolio) the design development process rather than focusing solely on final outputs

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
